wikipedia_page.main: Sir Charles St Leger Barter,  (1857–1931) was a career British Army officer.

response: The jug was bought by the British Museum in 1896 from Major General Charles St Leger Barter, who served in the Fourth Anglo-Ashanti War in December 1895 to February 1896 (also known as the Second Ashanti Expedition) which reached Kumasi and depose the Asantehene Prempeh I.
